title: smelly_london_20160828
description: Map of smells across London from Ministry of Health reports from 1848 to 1978.

options.query: select *, (CASE WHEN "number_of_smells" = 1 THEN 1 WHEN "number_of_smells" = 10 THEN 2 WHEN "number_of_smells" = 2 THEN 3 WHEN "number_of_smells" = 3 THEN 4 WHEN "number_of_smells" = 4 THEN 5 WHEN "number_of_smells" = 5 THEN 6 WHEN "number_of_smells" = 6 THEN 7 WHEN "number_of_smells" = 7 THEN 8 WHEN "number_of_smells" = 8 THEN 9 WHEN "number_of_smells" = 9 THEN 10 ELSE 11 END) as torque_category FROM (SELECT * FROM smelly_london_data_20160828) _cdb_wrap
